Protocol Describes the protocol
0 ConnectThread->client:0(FILL_BOARD) human_number
0 client->ConnectThread:0 true/false

1 BoardThread->client:1(NAME_CLIENT)
1 client->BoardThread:1 name_client

2 Board->BoardThread :2(REIZEN_REQUEST) reizen_value
2 BoardThread->client:2(REIZEN_REQUEST) reizen_value
2 client->BoardThread:2 true/false
2 BoardThread->Board :true/false

ReizenAI The class ReizenAI focuses on doing a clever reizen
Server The class Server implements the server side of the network code for Skat
Skat The class Skat describe a full game of skat
SkatClient The class SkatClient is the entry point for the client side
SkatServer The class SkatServer is the entry point for the server side
TextGUI The class TextGUI describes a text based GUI
Trick The class Trick describe a trick of 3 cards usual cycle is Trick, 3x addCard, declareWinner, getValue
WorkerThread The class WorkerThread encapsulate the different thread used for connection and board management.
WorkerThread.BoardThread The class BoardThread handles a board and the input/output with the clients
WorkerThread.ConnectThread The class ConnectThread handles the connection of clients and the number of AI players involved
WorkerThread.WatcherThread The class WatcherThread checks to see if all the human connections are still alive, if not, they gracefully terminate
 

Enum Summary
Board.GameType The different type of game
Card.Color The four colors
Card.Face The 8 faces
